verses.name: 2 Timothy 3:7
verses.text: Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 3:8
verses.text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 3:9
verses.text: But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 3:10
verses.text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,

verses.name: 2 Timothy 3:11
verses.text: Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of them all the Lord delivered me.
